name: The Big Three
description:
Story Synopsisin the year 1943, the Allies have achieved great victories on every battlefront. In order to accelerate the end the WWII, Roosevelt, Stalin and Churchill gathered in Teheran for a meeting. In history, it was called the Teheran Big Three. Not reconcile to call it a failure, Hitler sent his best Special Forces, equipped with the latest secret weapons, to kill the Big Three and turn the table. But the Big Three were not surrender. The player will play one of the Big Three to break through the encirclement of the SF and destroy the secret weapons of Nazi. Finally, the player will catch Hitler and win the game.



Classic Old School Style
The Big Three has fast paced battle mode and readily vehicle combat such as tank and air support.Challenging BossesDestroy Nazi Super Weapon: consist of Super Tank P1000 and the New Zeppelin Airship and more.

Special Skills For Each Characters
Each one of the Big Three has their own special skills to choose. For instance, Churchill has the skill of increase health, Roosevelt has the skill of enhancing the Air Force and Stalin is good at maneuver combat.




Interesting Weapon System
There are 8 different styles of weapons with different special attack modes. For example, shield gun has low damage but high protection.There'e also gauss rifles, the damage increases as the rife is charged longer.

Abundant Weapon Affix
Moreover, there are more than 30 kinds of prefixes and suffixes that have effects on the statistics of weapons. For example, the prefix journalist can enhance the moving speed of the player, and immortal can enhance the DEF while lowering the moving speed.

Multiplayer Games
The Big Three can be played with single player or multi-players on steam basis (still being tested). There are three ways to conduct the on-line processing: being invited by friends into multiplayer games, fast matching and entering rooms. Players can choose any ways to play on-line.
